Text: ATCO Power Canada Ltd Master Enabling AgreementAs discussed ECC hopes to transact with ATCO over the next week or so if we can agree on pricing This is the form of agreement they propose It represents the way their way JV owned plant will sell power offtake to marketers such as Enron I would be interested in your opinion especially if we are close to commercial agreement Please call me if you have any questions Regards Duncan Croasdale tel
